Vulnerabilities.Description: Allows attackers to inject malicious scripts into web pages viewed by other users.
Vulnerabilities.Prevention: Input validation, output encoding, HTTP-only cookies.
Vulnerabilities.Name: Cross-site scripting (XSS)

Vulnerabilities.Description: Allows attackers to execute malicious SQL statements in a web application's database.
Vulnerabilities.Prevention: Parameterized queries, input validation, least privilege principle.
Vulnerabilities.Name: SQL injection
